clauses.title: Termination
clauses.summary: 90 days notice period required for contract termination.

clauses.title: Liability Cap
clauses.summary: Total liability limited to 12 months' fees.

clauses.title: Data Protection
clauses.summary: GDPR compliance required for all data processing.

insights.message: Liability cap excludes data breach costs.
Renewal auto-renews unless cancelled 60 days before expiry.

evidence.snippet: Total liability limited to 12 months' fees.
Either party may terminate with 90 days written notice.

clauses.title: Service Level Agreement
clauses.summary: 99.9% uptime guarantee with penalties for downtime.

clauses.title: Payment Terms
clauses.summary: Net 30 payment terms with 2% early payment discount.

insights.message: No force majeure clause for service interruptions.
Automatic renewal clause may be disadvantageous.

clauses.title: Support Terms
clauses.summary: 24/7 technical support included in license fee.

insights.message: Well-balanced terms with clear usage rights.

evidence.snippet: License grants unlimited user access within licensee organization.

clauses.title: Deliverables
clauses.summary: Monthly reports and quarterly strategic reviews required.

clauses.title: Intellectual Property
clauses.summary: All work product belongs to client organization.

insights.message: Vague deliverable specifications may cause disputes.

evidence.snippet: Consultant shall provide monthly progress reports.

clauses.title: Data Security
clauses.summary: ISO 27001 compliance and encryption at rest required.

insights.message: Data residency requirements not clearly specified.
Usage-based pricing could lead to unexpected costs.

evidence.snippet: All data encrypted using AES-256 encryption standards.
